author: A_Brickset_user
title: Weak Sauce
review:
I got it for Kobe, being a Laker fan. 

Don't pay more than 30 cents for a basketball player minifig. A lot of people are selling for like .90 per player, but I got this set for $1.00, and it's barely worth $1.00.

author: hustla187
title: Better than I expected
review: You might think that getting a minifig of Kobe is cool but you also get Jason Kidd and Toni Kukoc. Kidd is a great player right now in the NBA. Kobe and Jason Kidd make this set good but not great. It gets a 3.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Sports (Basketball) - NBA Collectors #4 Review
review:
This set may doesn't have any play features but it still has a nice collector's value because of the minifigs. The minifigs are very famous basketball players. This set includes 3 of those in total: Kobe Bryant, Jason Kidd and Toni Kukoc. We also get a stand and a card for each figure. It's a good set to have but I would recommend you to get the bigger sets of this theme first before you get this one.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
